title: #34: Crime Scene Assessment and Behavioural Analysis of the Colonial Parkway Murders
description:
The Real Crime Profile Team, Jim, Laura and Lisa are joined once again by special guest Bill Thomas and continue to discuss the Colonial Parkway Murders. For the very first time Bill visited the crime scene where his sister, Cathy, and her partner, Becky Dowski, were murdered. Bill talks our profilers through the physical location and how this visit changed his mind about some of the things that he thought had happened over 30 years a go. Jim and Laura use the crime scene evidence and new information to inform their profile of the killer #HerNameWasCathy #HerNameWasBecky #ColonialParkwayMurder

Thank you to our sponsors Audible and Blue Apron! You can support the show and visit them here:

www.blueapron.com/realcrime

www.audible.com/realcrime
